name: MicroRC Simulation
description: MicroRC Simulation is a driving simulator for radio-controlled toy cars.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32/64-bit Processor: Intel core 2 duo 2.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Video Card Shader model 3.0. NVidia 7600, ATI X1600 or better Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32/64-bit Processor: Intel core 2 duo 2.4GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Video Card Shader model 3.0. NVidia 7600, ATI X1600 or better Storage: 400 MB available space
